source_notes: Company names are real-world EV charger and solar installers; contact numbers and license details are placeholders to be replaced with verified data.
Logo URLs are placeholders (use Jina to fetch real logos/images later).
Pricing and ratings are example ranges to seed the directory; confirm locally before publishing.

fields.id: Stable slug (kebab-case) used as the primary key.
fields.description: Short overview of what the installer specializes in.
fields.founded_year: Year operations began (approximate if not public).
fields.employees_estimate: Rough headcount or network size for scale context.
fields.service_area: List of primary states/regions or 'Nationwide USA'.
fields.service_models: Segments served: residential, commercial, fleet, multifamily, utility.
fields.services_offered: Menu of services (EV charger types, solar, storage, roofing, monitoring, O&M, panel upgrades).
fields.certifications: Trade licenses, NABCEP, EVITP, OEM/Tesla/Enphase/Qmerit certifications.
fields.utility_and_partner_affiliations: Utility programs, automaker partnerships, financing/retail partners.
fields.financing: Available payment models and any notes.
fields.pricing: Typical ballpark pricing ranges for EV L2/DCFC and solar/battery adders.
fields.rebates_and_programs: Rebate programs the installer regularly processes.
fields.ratings: Avg rating, review count, and source descriptor.
fields.featured_projects: Representative projects with location, size, equipment, and segment.
fields.sustainability_practices: Recycling, carbon tracking, or efficiency practices.
fields.photos: Logo and gallery placeholders (replace with Jina image URLs).
fields.data_quality_notes: Caveats or reminders to verify specific fields.
